content:
Per @Debi Willis on Aug 23 -

Do we have a status on the patient WG yet? Is it going to happen?

Per me a week later -

WG? TF? Maybe we should combine them (not quite a portmanteau) and call it the WTF.

What's our status, folks? It turns out it's REALLY hard to find things in the Atlanta agenda if I don't know where we fit in the ontology. (Not to mention that I'm already finding it clumsy to talk to people about all this if I don't know what to call it.)

I suspect we're not yet really a "WG" because (per threads here) those have special powers.
@Wayne Kubick Has the TSC talked about this?

I've discussed with Austin but we haven't been able to discuss yet at TSC due to other urgent matters - hopefully at WGM. We do have the Confluence page and listserv set up so we can begin to recruit & interact using those.

I've discussed with Austin but we haven't been able to discuss yet at TSC due to other urgent matters - hopefully at WGM. We do have the Confluence page and listserv set up so we can begin to recruit & interact using those.

Here in confluence page but its empty: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/PE/Patient+Empowerment+Home
I uploaded the notes from are informal meeting and Lloyd's WG proposal to the confluence page
